File /std/room/inherit/terrain_map/simple_feature.c

This type of feature generates distance messages to the feature based on how far away it is. It uses a small basic string as the main part of the description and adds in distance messages to show how far away the item is.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Mon Apr 1 12:50:02 PST 2002
